sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import {Button,Form,Tab,Row,Col,Nav} from 'react-bootstrap'; import {useState} from 'react' import axios from 'axios'; function Post({id, movie}) { const [input,setInput]=useState( { title:"", genres:"", director:"", runtime:"", posterUrl:"" } ) const handleChange=(e)=>{ const {name,value}=e.target; setInput( { ...input,[name]:value } ); console.log(input) } const handleSubmit=(e)=>{ e.preventDefault() console.log('input',input) axios.post('https://react-crud-ddca5-default-rtdb.firebaseio.com/posts.json',JSON.stringify(input)).then((response)=> console.log(response)) .catch((error)=> console.log('error')) } return (
Title Geners Director Runtime PosteUrl
) } export default Post ;
